bibl.title: A Jewish Family in Ptolemaic Thebes.
bibl.note: Adds O. Wilcken II, 731 and 2 demotic texts to the dossier of Straton, son of Straton, and his brother Isakis (O. Tait Bodl. 158 = C.P.Jud. I, 77; O. Tait Bodl. 163 = C.P.Jud. I, 78; O. Tait Bodl. 164 = C.P.Jud. I, 79). Observations on the jewish names.
CLARYSSE Willy, A Jewish Family in Ptolemaic Thebes.
145.4 O. Tait Bodl. 158; 163; 164 O. Wilcken II, 731
